creator: sandeep_warade@hotmail.com
text:
I am using apache 1.3 alongwith php 4.3.4 and mysql 4.1.1 on windows XP
When i load a page, some part of page gets loaded properly but in some part 
unreadable characters or ascii characters or the same things loaded above gets 
displayed again. After refreshing 2-3 times or some times 10-15 times the page 
gets displayed properly. I don't understand what is the problem? Whether there 
is a problem of apache configuration or php configuration.
I have developed a software which handles stores, purchase activities.
So it is very serious for me.
Please help me.

Created attachment 9993
This image is of php page in browser which contains some unwanted characters with html code
creator: sandeep_warade@hotmail.com
slive@apache.org
text: 1.3.23 is very old.  Can you try with a more modern version of Apache?

Sounds like a PHP problem, thread safety issue, or a really messed up socket
stack causing corruption (such as on XP prior to service pack 1.)

Closing as invalid since this is likely a bug in those old PHP modules or in
your OS.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
